waiting.title: Request to join has been sent
waiting.text: You will be able to work on behalf of this company when the administrator of the company has confirmed your request.

active.title: You are an employee of the company and can work on its behalf.

refused.title: Your request has been rejected
refused.text: Do you have any questions? Contact your company administrator.

deleted.title: The company left the site on {{ date }}
deleted.text: Do you have any questions? Contact the site's technical support team.

unauth.title: Login or register to accept the invitation
unauth.text: You will be able to submit a request to join the company after logging in.
